example.name: layer-xstaff
example.description: Demonstration of an unusual interaction of layers across staves. Note in particular that the first treble clef on the bottom staff comes before the end of the bar so that a note from the stop staff can be written in treble clef. Example from Joseph Haydn's keyboard sonata in G minor, Hoboken XVI:44 (Wiener Urtex no. 32), mvmt. 1.

file.name: xstaff.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: xstaff.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
